name: Terramino
description:
UI Controls

Navigation: WASD - Arrow keys

Confirm: Space - V

Game Controls

Movement: WASD - Arrow keys

Jump: Space - V

Rotate piece: W - Up arrow key - 

Move piece: AD - Left and right arrow key

Fast fall: S - Down arrow key

Lock down: Space - V

Controllers also supported!

Description

Terramino is a short puzzle-platformer with elements of Mario Maker and Tetris combined! 

Build your own solutions to challenging puzzles and get to the flag!

Credits

sheeb - Lead developer and Art

JBroook - Programming and Sound 

CptHardluck - Music and Logos
